channel.description: Recent content in Nosql on Ian Wootten

item.title: Breaking up Relationships with CouchDB
item.description: [NB: This is an unpublished post I wrote in 2010 on getting started with CouchDB. Therefore, despite all the code and examples being relevant, it may be considered somewhat ‘belated’] Beware – there’s a bunch of home wreckers out there intent on removing the love of your life and replacing it with a wicked mistress. For me, my first experiments working with databases were performed with Oracle, the staple of our computer science course at the time.
